alert.note: Alert for Kent (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 5:12PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Kent County through 545 PM EDT... At 511 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Newtown, or 9 miles east of Middle River, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chestertown, Rock Hall, Millington, Betterton, Sassafras, Old Town, Langford, Newtown, Overton, Morgnec, Massey, Kennedyville, Galena and Kingstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
